languages.text: "Если бы я могла увидеть золотой свет Астрономикона, как видишь его ты, Кассия… я бы, наверное, замерла навеки, и вовсе не смогла отвести от него глаз".
"If I could see the golden light of the Astronomican as you see it, Cassia... I would probably go still forever, unable to take my eyes off the radiance of the Emperor for an instant."
languages.original_text: "Если бы я могла увидеть золотой свет Астрономикона, как видишь его ты, Кассия… я бы, наверное, замерла навеки, и вовсе не смогла отвести от него глаз".

traits.locale_text: "If I could see the golden light of the Astronomican as you see it, Cassia... I would probably go still forever, unable to take my eyes off it for an instant."
"If I could see the golden light of the Astronomican as you see it, Cassia... I would probably go still forever, unable to take my eyes off it for an instant."
"If I could see the golden light of the Astronomican as you see it, Cassia... I would probably go still forever, unable to take my eyes off it for an instant."
"If I could see the golden light of the Astronomican as you see it, Cassia... I would probably go still forever, unable to take my eyes off it for an instant."

languages.text: “卡西娅，如果我能像你一样看到星炬的金色光辉……我可能会一动不动地盯着神皇的明光，连眼睛都不眨一下。”
languages.original_text: "If I could see the golden light of the Astronomican as you see it, Cassia... I would probably go still forever, unable to take my eyes off the radiance of the Emperor for an instant."

traits.locale_text: “卡西娅，如果我能像你一样看到星炬的金色光辉……我可能会一动不动地盯着神皇的明光，连眼睛都不眨一下。”

languages.text: « Si je pouvais voir la lumière dorée de l'Astronomican comme vous, Cassia... J'imagine que je resterais figée à tout jamais, incapable de détourner le regard de l'éclat de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "If I could see the golden light of the Astronomican as you see it, Cassia... I would probably go still forever, unable to take my eyes off the radiance of the Emperor for an instant."

traits.locale_text: « Si je pouvais voir la lumière dorée de l'Astronomican comme vous, Cassia... J'imagine que je resterais figée à tout jamais, incapable de détourner le regard de l'éclat de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: "Könnte ich das goldene Licht des Astronomican so sehen wie Ihr, Cassia ... Dann würde ich vermutlich für immer verstummen, unfähig, meine Augen auch nur eine Sekunde lang von der Strahlkraft des Imperators abzuwenden."
languages.original_text: "If I could see the golden light of the Astronomican as you see it, Cassia... I would probably go still forever, unable to take my eyes off the radiance of the Emperor for an instant."

traits.locale_text: "Könnte ich das goldene Licht des Astronomican so sehen wie Ihr, Cassia ... Dann würde ich vermutlich für immer verstummen, unfähig, meine Augen auch nur eine Sekunde lang davon zu lösen."

languages.text: 「もし私が、あなたが見ているような星辰波の金の光を見ることができたとしたら…カシア。私は皇帝の輝きから一瞬たりとも目を離すことができず、いつまでもじっとしていることでしょうね」
languages.original_text: "If I could see the golden light of the Astronomican as you see it, Cassia... I would probably go still forever, unable to take my eyes off the radiance of the Emperor for an instant."

traits.locale_text: 「もし私が、あなたが見ているような星辰波の金の光を見ることができたとしたら…カシア。私は皇帝の輝きから一瞬たりとも目を離すことができず、いつまでもじっとしていることでしょうね」

languages.text: «Si pudiera ver la luz dorada del Astronomicón como usted, Cassia... probablemente me quedaría inmóvil eternamente, incapaz de dejar de mirar el resplandor del Emperador ni un momento».
languages.original_text: "If I could see the golden light of the Astronomican as you see it, Cassia... I would probably go still forever, unable to take my eyes off the radiance of the Emperor for an instant."

traits.locale_text: «Si pudiera ver la luz dorada del Astronomicón como usted, Cassia... probablemente me quedaría inmóvil eternamente, incapaz de dejar de mirar el resplandor del Emperador ni un momento».

languages.original_text: "If I could see the golden light of the Astronomican as you see it, Cassia... I would probably go still forever, unable to take my eyes off the radiance of the Emperor for an instant."

languages.text: "Keşke Astronomikan'ın altın ışığını senin gibi görebilsem Cassia... Kesin öylece donakalır, gözlerimi bir an olsun İmparator'un nurundan alamazdım."
languages.original_text: "If I could see the golden light of the Astronomican as you see it, Cassia... I would probably go still forever, unable to take my eyes off the radiance of the Emperor for an instant."

traits.locale_text: "Keşke Astronomikan'ın altın ışığını senin gibi görebilsem Cassia... Kesin öylece donakalır, gözlerimi bir an olsun İmparator'un nurundan alamazdım."
